Here's how David Letterman recounted his very first meeting with Michelle Obama . She was on the show, but I didn't think I would see her because the Secret Service doesn't want my kind messing around with her kind, David Letterman joked. However, the officials told David Letterman to wait for the first lady off stage and that she would speak to him after her interview with Regis Philbin and Kelly Ripa . Mike Pence shut the door today on a run for the presidency, but left open the likelihood that he'll seek a different office: Governor of Indiana. In the choice between seeking national office and serving Indiana in some capacity, we choose Indiana, Mike Pence , R-Columbus, said of himself and wife Karen in a letter being sent to supporters.`` We will not seek the Republican nomination for president in 2012.'' He said he would make a decision

date. Last night, he received a call from David Letterman on which he clarified that he isn't actually retiring- just simply leaving Live!.
